column.value:
[{PARAM_NAME_COLUMN=MAIL_FROM, PARAM_VALUE_COLUMN="noreply@pauleka.com"}, {PARAM_NAME_COLUMN=MAIL_TO, PARAM_VALUE_COLUMN=context.MAIL_INFO_METIER}, {PARAM_NAME_COLUMN=MAIL_TITLE, PARAM_VALUE_COLUMN=context.ENV + " - Fichiers IMPORTS"}, {PARAM_NAME_COLUMN=MAIL_BODY, PARAM_VALUE_COLUMN="Bonjour
Voici les fichiers d'imports traités.
Cordialement,
Pim Talend"}, {PARAM_NAME_COLUMN=MAIL_FILEPATH, PARAM_VALUE_COLUMN=context.WORKSPACE +context.PROJECT + "/" +context.FLOW +"/" + context.DIR_REPORT + "REPORT_IMPORT_" + ((String)globalMap.get("HORODATAGE"))+".xlsx"}]
